title: Notes.
body: I understand we have a notes system where you can attach a note to a player you have added. Very effective for remembering who is who on my big friendlist of plebs. Now what i propose is we have a general notes tab where we can put any notes we want, maybe our self recorded lp gains, general swag messages or something important like names of people who i want to dodge when i get on my team kthx pls implement kthxbai

replies.body: Notepad, Excel, Google Spreadsheet, Google Docs

i use stickynotes man. 

give it a go
